original_text: Look! They are preparing a feast. They put down carpets for people to sit on. They are eating and they are drinking. Officers, stand up! Make your shields ready for battle!
korean_text: 그들이 식탁을 베풀고 파수꾼을 세우고 먹고 마시도다 너희 고관들아 일어나 방패에 기름을 바를지어다

sentences.original_text: Look! They are preparing a feast.
They put down carpets for people to sit on.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 사람들이 앉을 수 있도록 카펫을 깔아놓는다.

sentences.original_text: They are eating and they are drinking.
Make your shields ready for battle!
